products.title: Roma (Fr), Light Grey - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) collection features flame-retardant fabrics, which makes them perfect for either the family home or commercial site. The light grey edition is sure to blend within any dcor style for a contemporary look with subtle shade. Form an attractive and delicate palette, with an industrial edge, by incorporating the light grey with a soft blend of pastels in vintage pinks and creams. Accent the blind by adding subdued grey fabrics within the rest of the room, adding character and charm with dainty florals and paisley prints.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Showcase the brilliant and bright roma (fr) in crimson within a playful room to include stimulating colour and modern style. The contemporary roller mechanism and striking dye produces an eye-catching look in a dazzling and distinctive red shade. Complement the crimson with a fun and friendly collection of primary colours, forming a welcoming and plentiful colour scheme for a playroom. Encourage an imaginative and creative feel by blending blocks of contrasting colour with a stark white background for vivid bursts of colour.

products.title: Tiffany, Imagine - Roller Blind
products.description: Dare to imagine the ideal blend of natural beige, soothing creams, and a naturally flowing raised patterning, and you have the tiffany imagine, the calming influence you have been looking for. The imagine will work wonderfully amongst contrasting dark woods in a neutral living or sitting room, or in a luxurious bedroom full of browns, creams, and golds. Or place in a guest bedroom or hallway where the distinctive tiffany patterning can add a touch of neutral style with little effort.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Azure - Roller Blind
products.description: For an eye-catching window display, feature the vivid roma (fr) in azure. Made from sturdy, flame-retardant material, perfect for commercial use, this is a modern blind with a simple rolling mechanism for easy functionality. Blend the vibrant azure with bursts of lime green, dove grey, and duck egg blue to form a current palette of summer brights. Stick to a soothing white or ivory base for a clean and contemporary look, adding heaps of character and contrast by intertwining the selected tones with botanic prints and compelling textures.

products.title: Deanna, Mist - Roller Blind
products.description: The deanna mist is a very modern take on a standard white blind. With a gentle hint of silver and the two-tone effect created by the raised deanna patterning, this blind offers a pretty and classy shimmer. The mist is the perfect addition to any contemporary room and will contrast well with crisp, clean colours and tones, setting off against rich greys particularly well. Use in a bedroom for a bright and airy feel, or in a bathroom to keep the atmosphere fresh and clean.

products.title: Deanna, Soft Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a gentle, off-white cream to provide a calming, discreet background colour, but want a little bit of character to go with it, then the softly patterned deanna in soft cream is the blind for you. Ideal for a hallway in which you want to control the light without darkening the room or clashing with your existing interior dcor, this blind will work well against browns and other neutrals.

products.title: Tiffany, Dove - Roller Blind
products.description: A clever and enchanting blend of different tones of cream, the tiffany dove is a light, classy blind whose patterning provides a distinctive and eye-catching feature for any window in your home. Place in the bedroom to provide a light and airy feel, and a natural colour against other dcor, or perhaps add to the bathroom, where the dove will offer balance and airiness when set against bolder colours that need toning down.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Chambray - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, dark blue of the origin (blackout) in chambray is one of elegance and royalty, and can induce a moody or a regal feel depending on what it's paired with. Its sleek, cutting edge finish makes it a pleasure to use and means it will stand the test of time, just like its colour. Use in the bedroom alongside dark woods and gold trims for a regal, stately look, or pair with light and dark greys and off-whites in the dining room or home office for a contemporary but moody feel.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Illusion - Roller Blind
products.description: Pretty in rosy pink, the origin (blackout)'s illusion is an attractive and appealing shade, combining all of the benefits of a blackout blind with a contemporary, pretty look. It's deceptively sturdy, enough so that it can handle plenty of day-to-day use. Nestle the illusion amongst whites, creams, and paler pinks to create a candy-coloured dream bedroom. Or go for something a little different by placing it in a bathroom; after all, who says bathrooms have to be aqua? We certainly don't.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Riptide - Roller Blind
products.description: Is it blue or is it grey? Or perhaps it has a hint of mint green in it? The chameleon-like origin (blackout) riptide will get your guests talking, and whilst it's doing that will still be offering a sleek, robust window covering that blocks light easily. Nestle the riptide amongst aqua blues and turquoises to bring out the fresh iciness of this blind. It's the perfect hue for a green or blue bathroom, or would work well as a subtle accent colour in a light and airy white bedroom or hallway.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Shield against the night-time light and bright, summertime sun with the origin (blackout) in crimson, a quality blackout blind that fits perfectly in any window size. This plush red shade is sure to brighten your home, whilst simultaneously adding a modern edge with its simple rolling mechanism. Form a romantic and attractive dcor by featuring the crimson amongst an assortment of dainty florals and delicate details.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Sky - Roller Blind
products.description: The vivid blue of the origin (blackout)'s sky is a sight to behold, being even more sky-blue than anything outside can offer. This bright tone will bring the outside in, even when it's blacking out the sun from outside. For a bold, playful look in a playroom or child's bedroom, match the sky with a colourful wallpaper full of greens, yellows, and oranges. Alternatively, add to a white or cream home office for a striking look and a clean, contemporary feel.

products.title: Euphoria, Coral - Roller Blind
products.description: Euphoria coral brings a lively mix of contemporary colour to the party, and allows you to add that artistic finishing touch you've been looking for at the same time. The pinks and reds work in perfect harmony with the darker shades to add depth and subtlety to your decor like never before. Add coral to the kitchen, and give yourself the extra spark of inspiration you need to create a culinary feast unlike any other.

products.title: Entity, Coral - Roller Blind
products.description: When you're looking for the perfect combination of retro patterning and contemporary colour, entity coral is the fabric that you've been waiting for. The smooth lines work in perfect harmony with the gentle coral colouring that gives this design its name. Add entity coral to the living room, and match it with some retro geometric wall art. That way you can extend the theme around the room, and it will only take half an hour to really bring it to life.

products.title: Love Is All Around - Roller Blind
products.description: When it comes to a design that will make you smile the moment you walk in the door, they don't come any more compelling than love is all around. The contemporary styling and mixtures of gently faded electric colours is just what you need to add some life and vitality to your chosen space. Matching to love is all around is a decision between choosing your favourite shade from the fabric, or going in your own direction and adding a faded mint green.

products.title: Milano, Waterfall - Vertical Blind
products.description: To create a dcor scheme with calming colour and creativity, opt for the enchanting milano in waterfall. This exquisite cloth features a restful cornflower blue shade and a fusion of silk-inspired threads for added decoration and texture. Plus, modern, adaptable louvres allow you to control the amount of light and breeze entering the room. Perfect for a relaxing restroom, the waterfall can be matched with a soft white background and complementing features in chalky blue and azure tones.

products.title: Lusso, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The lusso in cream has a paper-soft feel, making it a pleasing and appealing blind to touch. Its hue is a beautiful, homely cream, perfect for hanging in a modern family home. Between the discreet stitching and the texture of the fabric, a lightly checked appearance is formed, whilst the blind is all one colour. The cream would make a perfect addition to the kitchen, where its functional look and feel will suit the purpose of the room wonderfully.

products.title: Burlington, Mantis - Vertical Blind
products.description: In soft mint green, the burlington mantis is a traditionally patterned blind with the contemporary edge of the vertically hanging louvres. The gentle curves of the pattern are intricately stitched, offering a feeling of depth and texture. Opt for a cool colour palette in the kitchen to keep the room feeling light and airy by pairing the mantis with pure whites. Keep the base of the room white, using matching mint hues to accessorise, and go for silver fixtures and fittings to complement.

products.title: Origin, Champagne - Venetian Blind
products.description: Origin champagne is the touch of natural luxury that you have been searching for. With every slat created by masters of their craft you have the perfect canvas for the gentle fizzle of this off-white masterpiece. The touch of luxury and effortless style that every home deserves. Origin, champagne - venetian blind origin champagne is the touch of natural luxury that you have been searching for.

products.title: Abstract Hearts - Roller Blind
products.description: We love abstract hearts, and we hope you do too. If you're looking to add some charm and individuality to your chosen space, there's nothing better than a classic design that's been reinvented with an abstract twist. Just what you need when you want to see something different every time you look at your new blinds. If you want to really take your decor to new heights, keep your decor minimal, your walls neutral, and create a theme by adding some matching wall art.

products.title: Hearts Dess - Roller Blind
products.description: When you're feeling a little blue, there's nothing better than creating decor that makes you feel like you're getting a great big hug the moment you walk in the door. That's what we've tried to achieve with hearts dess, and we think you're going to love the gentle off-white and calming blues we've used. If you want to extend the theme around the room, how about adding some faded pinks and greens to the mix? That way you can enjoy plenty of colour contrasts, but not in a way that overwhelms your chosen space.

products.title: Smiling Clouds Candy - Roller Blind
products.description: Smiling clouds candy is a roller blind that will melt your heart the very first time you see it. The gentle contrast between the soft white and the faded pink allows the design to sit elegantly in the background, adding depth and character along the way. Matching to this stunning valentine's-inspired design is all about being soft with the pastel colours. A faded sky blue is a great option for your walls, and if you're feeling adventurous you might even want to think about a washed out mint green.

products.title: Tribe, Coral - Roller Blind
products.description: Tribe coral combines an electric blue, calming coral, and a classic geometric pattern to create a design that no one should be without. The first time you see it you'll be amazed at how easy it's been to find the missing piece of your decor puzzle. Matching your scatter cushions and lampshades to the electric blue is a great way to build a theme in the master bedroom that won't overwhelm your existing decor.

products.title: Valentine - Roller Blind
products.description: Valentine is the design you've been waiting for if you want to make your house a home in a just a couple of minutes. The black and white lines ebb and flow to give the design a lovely sketched quality. Just what you need when you want the loved up red to really come to life. Bring your bedroom right up to date by adding valentine this weekend. It's a strikingly simple design, and that's why it can be the focal point that you've been searching for.

products.title: Burlington, Waterfall - Vertical Blind
products.description: In a gorgeous shade of baby blue, the burlington waterfall is reminiscent of blue summer sky, and the gently curved lines of the patterning, with its intricate and varied stitching, only add to the blind's dreamy effect. Give a nursery a sweet and subtle pop of colour by including the waterfall in the window. The colour is soft enough to help craft a calming ambience in the room whilst simultaneously bringing life and colour the scheme.

products.title: Burlington, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: A pretty, yellowy tone, the burlington in cream is a homely blind with a somewhat traditional look and feel. Well-stitched curves adorn this high quality blind, and the sleek louvres offer a contemporary edge to an otherwise classic fabric. Give the cream a home amidst fellow creams, oatmeals, and fawns, where it will sit pretty in this field of neutrals. This light look will give a living room or dining room a feeling of spaciousness and light, and can be easily accented with brushed golds or bronzes.

products.title: Origin, African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.description: Sleek and elegant in jet black, the origin's african blackwood offers streamlined modernity yet with all of the quality and practicality of real wood. Their basswood is sourced from ecologically responsible, sustainable forests, and provides a high standard of finish. For the ultimate in contemporary style, feature the african blackwood amidst a sunny yellow scheme, painting the walls to contrast with the ebony tone.

products.title: Origin, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: Solitaire is a gentle infusion of white and light grey that flow into one another to create a delicate tone that adds a natural touch to any home. To accent the subtle colour we have crafted light and finely honed wooden slats that hang effortlessly in any space. Perfect for adding that gentle atmosphere of relaxation that makes a house a home. Origin, solitaire - venetian blind solitaire is a gentle infusion of white and light grey that flow into one another to create a delicate tone that adds a natural touch to any home.

products.title: Burlington, Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: Intended to catch the eye, the burlington in cameo hosts a collection of beguiling textures in a brilliant, classy white, and a distinctive arrangement. Containing refined, satin-like threads to generate an engaging blind, it offers modern, adaptable louvres to suit your shading and privacy preferences. For a sleek and stylish dcor scheme in your dining area, coordinate the cameo with similar, satiny textures, such as silky napkins and a glossy table runner.

products.title: Richmond (Blackout), Cameo - Vertical Blind
products.description: A powerful blackout blind, the richmond (blackout) in cameo offers unbeatable protection from outside lights, whether from street lamps, traffic, or the sun itself. The hardwearing fabric displays beautifully stitched curved lines, slightly raised from the surface for intrigue and depth. In an all-white bathroom, hang the cameo to give complete light protection and privacy when you need it. Stick to white walls and tiling, complementing this cool look occasionally with a sweet sky blue, using it in your towels and bath mats.

products.title: Milano, Mantis - Vertical Blind
products.description: In sweet minty green, the milano's mantis is a delicately decorative piece, offering a smoothly stitched canvas adorned with attractively curved lines in contrasting stitching. The colour is a cool hue that provides a pretty hit of colour without overpowering the room. Why not opt for the calming influence of the mantis in the nursery? It will look simply stunning against tranquil off-whites and soothing greys, and can easily be mixed with cute animal patterns, polka dots, and stripes.

products.title: Ajanta (Blackout), Raven - Vertical Blind
products.description: A striking metallic setting the backdrop for cracked black patterning, the ajanta (blackout) raven is truly a sight to behold, and will set the mood for any room. Despite its dark hue, this blind remains efficient for light control, with adjustable louvres for you to move to your liking. Use as part of a moody, gothic dining room scheme, with greys and silvers to offset it. Or perhaps it might suit a teenager's bedroom, where they can maintain privacy whilst giving their room style and substance.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Crimson - Vertical Blind
products.description: The palermo (blackout) crimson is far from shy and retiring, and will make a statement in any room it's used. Wipe-clean, fully adjustable, and durable louvres mean that this is a blind that will stand the test of time - both in use and in style. Kids will love having this brightly coloured blind added to their bedroom or playroom, where it will complement a wide range of fun, patterned wallpapers.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Riptide - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in riptide features a lightweight, malleable fabric and a gorgeously cool, icy shade of blue. Adjustable louvres protect you from light disturbances and excess heat as and when you need it; simply tilt or move aside as you please. Group with bright whites and the subtlest of silvers in a modern, calming home office or dining room, where light woods will suit it best. Or insert some subtle colour into your hallway or landing, without overpowering any existing dcor choices.

products.title: Affinity, Touch - Vertical Blind
products.description: The affinity touch is close to pure white, but without the stark brightness, and has a pretty scattered patterning over the top. This simple and attractive blind is made from an enduring, textured fabric, and offers effective light-filtering properties to allow the light in whilst offering privacy. Use in the bedroom for a romantic, wistful feel, without compromising on contemporary design. Surround with dusky pinks or muted greens for country, summery look all year round, and accessorise with brushed golds and cast iron furniture.

products.title: Tiffany, Smoulder - Vertical Blind
products.description: The tiffany smoulder's dark charcoal shade is the height of style, with its softly curving pattern and lightweight yet durable fabric, and offers a modern, up-to-date style that just can't be outdone. Use it for privacy, gently tilting the louvres when you'd like more light. Use in a modern dining room, set against white walls and pale soft furnishings, with the occasional silver or red accessory to add a pop of colour.

products.title: Tiffany, Flawless - Vertical Blind
products.description: Sophisticated and calming, the soft white of the tiffany flawless is an understated way of adding pattern and texture to a window. This soothing blind is deceptively robust, despite its light appearance, and slides easily along the rail when the louvres are tilted or moved. The flawless will indeed look flawless amongst soft greys and cool silvers in a bedroom or home office; or sit amongst icy blues, baby pinks, or soft lilacs for a pretty, romantic appearance in a master bedroom or guest room.

products.title: Rapture (Blackout), Code - Vertical Blind
products.description: Rapture (blackout)'s code captures dreamy taupe with dove grey and shimmering silver accents, resulting in an attractive, contemporary blind that will blend in effortlessly with existing dcor choices. Don't forget that their vertical blinds have easily adjustable louvres that can be tilted back and forth to allow in as much or as little light as you wish. Complement slate greys or rich browns by using the code in the kitchen for a window covering that is both stylish and convenient.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Pewter - Vertical Blind
products.description: In soft slate grey, the roma (fr) in pewter is a versatile neutral that can be used to match a wide range of decor styles. The flawless fabric is flame-retardant, making it an ideal choice for a commercial property, and hangs in orderly louvres for a tidy and streamlined aesthetic. Tame pillar-box reds, jet blacks, and stark whites by adding the softness of the pewter to the mix. Stick to white walls to maintain a feeling of light and space, and use block colour items for clean lines and hard edges, forming a highly contemporary look.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Palace - Vertical Blind
products.description: Palermo (blackout)'s palace is a dark, royal blue on a slick, durable fabric. Movable louvres mean that you can make your room as dark or as light as you like, not restricting you to the deep shade of the blue twenty-four-seven. Make the palace stand out by placing in a kitchen or bathroom with white tiling and units, and give the room a cool, understated look with added silvers. Alternatively, go bright and bold by accenting with bright yellows or oranges in a bedroom or lounge.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Blush - Vertical Blind
products.description: Pink and pretty, the palermo (blackout) blush blends a gorgeously pale hue with strength and durability. The lightly textured fabric reflects the light beautifully, and the tilting louvres can be adjusted and clean with ease, making for a practical yet attractive window covering. Brighten up a contemporary home office by adding the blush to off-white walls and luxurious soft furnishings; or instead, make a child very happy by painting their bedroom a matching shade of pink to give the room a lovely, rosy glow.

products.title: Affinity, Storm - Vertical Blind
products.description: The muted grey of the affinity storm is offset by the raised stitched pattern that covers the blind from head to toe. This pretty blind does little to give away the resilience of its high quality fabric, yet it is nonetheless durable and long-lasting. The storm would suit a fresh, contemporary dining room, in combination with white walls and glass furniture, and would work brilliantly as an attractive window feature in an otherwise plain downstairs cloakroom, hallway, or utility room.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Latte - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a window covering with delectable shading and contemporary style, elect the modest roma (fr) in latte, which hosts a creamy, coffee shade on an ample, crease-free cloth. With modern effect and graceful elegance, this classy fabric sits in adaptable slats that allow you to manually regulate the amount of light and breeze entering the room. Fashion a sophisticated living space by coordinating the latte with a flattering cream surrounding, adding accenting colour with plenty of coffee-toned fabrics and conker-hued furnishings.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Crimson - Vertical Blind
products.description: The roma (fr) in crimson displays a delightfully cheerful poppy red, making it a bold and vibrant choice for any room. It has added practicality, as well as style, with its neat, easily adjustable louvres for maintaining your desired levels of light, air, and privacy. Craft an unconventional colour scheme in your bathroom by melding the crimson with a white base in terms of tiling, wall paint, and suite.

products.title: Sarra (Blackout), Palace - Vertical Blind
products.description: A dark, but not quite navy, blue, the sarra (blackout) palace blind will add style, depth of colour, and elegance to any room, whilst still maintaining a useful practicality via its effective blackout qualities and wipe-clean surface. If you love to bring the night sky in, use in a bedroom amongst silvers and whites to create a midnight feel all day long. Or use as part of a naval colour scheme in the kitchen by offsetting with whites and reds, for a stylish and timeless look.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cerise - Vertical Blind
products.description: Pretty in hot, striking pink, the palermo (blackout) in cerise is a bold, funky choice that will have an instant impact when you walk into the room. This blind is gently textured, so the light bounces off it prettily as it hits it. Perfect for a child's bedroom, amongst paler baby pinks and soft whites, the cerise is best accessorised with shiny silvers and white furniture. Or go ultra-modern, and team with blacks and slates to really make a statement in a teenager's room or contemporary dining room.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Zest - Vertical Blind
products.description: Gorgeous apple green and gently raised texturing meet in the palermo (blackout) zest, an easily manoeuvrable blind that allows you to maintain colour, brightness, and privacy, whilst keeping the outside light at bay. Brighten up a tan or beige kitchen colour scheme by planting the zest as a key feature, bringing your existing dcor to life; or use in the kids' playroom to match playful wallpaper and bright, fun furniture - it doesn't even matter if it clashes, as that's half the fun.

products.title: Roma (Fr), Azure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The azure features a bold cobalt blue that will draw the eye to the window and give a cheery, spring-summer look. It is a member of the roma (fr) range, a flame-retardant collection perfect for commercial properties, yet also stylish enough to use in the home. Transform a boring playroom into a child's haven by including the azure in a bright and colourful decor scheme, teaming it with other primary and secondary colours for a fun and vibrant setting.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Cotton - Vertical Blind
products.description: A delicate shade of white, the palermo (blackout) in cotton is a refreshing and energising blind that will help you maintain a light and airy feel even when you need the blind closed. The durability of the fabric transfers to the opening and closing mechanism of the firm, neat louvres, giving you complete control. Use the cotton to create a blank canvas in a bathroom or utility room, and adorn with floral accessories and country colours.

products.title: Tiffany, Dove - Vertical Blind
products.description: The tiffany dove is an attractive and functional blind; a soft grey-taupe shade patterned with curved, almost grass-shaped wisps. This effective filter blind will meet your needs in both the aesthetic and functionality stakes. Use within a modern living room, where the walls and carpets are a soft cream, and the woods are dark brown. Otherwise, sit against taupe walls and pale green accents for an irresistible kitchen colour scheme, or to create a relaxed feel in your home office.
